action.name: Set text
action.param: "Blind Guy:" & newline & "Can you tell me the way to the chinese restaurant?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "Do you want to come to my party tonight?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "I would love to! See you then!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "Hello... what a day... I woke up today on the wrong leg. "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "My right leg is my good leg but when I get up on the left I know that the next 320 hours will not be enjoyable. "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "It is a curse! It already started with the window. It was open! I always close it before going to bed but somebody must have broken in and opened my window!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "I bet it was Hannibal. I lost to him in Poker yesterday but I could not pay him. With what should I pay him? I need my money for my holiday trip. "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "And what now? Here I stand and am not even the main character of this game. I am cuter than you and I have 12 Friends on allmyfriendsbook, which is more than you do."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Pudi:" & newline & "Thank you that you listened to my problems! Now I feel much better" & newline & "I would love to come to your party! See you later!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "Do you want to come to my party tonight?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Vuvuzela Girl:" & newline & "I am so exhausted. My mom told me I have to play my vuvuzela to earn some food..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "The girl forgot her vuvuzela..." & newline & "I think I will take it. Maye I can also learn how to use it..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "They have the best fish in town. Unfortunately closed..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "I wonder what this smell could be..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Mayn Tschar:" & newline & "Today is farmers market. Im glad the streets are not that full yet..."
